page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT AT TEVIOTHEAD
page.content: {AGRICULTURE}IS THE MAIN INDUSTRY IN THE AREA, WITH TWO FARMERS AND SEVERAL WORKERS HERE FULL-TIME AND CASUAL HELP AT LAMBING TIME. ONE FARMER'S WIFE RUNS THE POST OFFICE IN PART OF HER HOUSE. SOME WOMEN REMAIN AT HOME TO LOOK AFTER YOUNG CHILDREN WHILE SOME OTHERS DO DOMESTIC WORK IN THE LARGER HOUSES. SEVERAL PEOPLE TRAVEL TO WORK IN HAWICK. JOBS SUCH AS TEACHING, MAINTENANCE, SNOW-CLEARING, PAINTING AND FENCING ARE ALL DONE BY PEOPLE FROM HAWICK. SEVERAL RETIRED PEOPLE ALSO LIVE IN THE AREA. {UNEMPLOYMENT}DOES NOT AFFECT THE AREA AS THOSE WHO ARE UNEMPLOYED TEND TO MOVE TO THE TOWN TO SEEK WORK.
